SMA: "//@version=5\nindicator(title=\"Hull Moving Average×3\", shorttitle=\"HMA×3\", overlay=true, timeframe=\"\", timeframe_gaps=true)\n\nlen1 = input.int(9, minval=1, title=\"length\")\nlen2 = input.int(9, minval=1, title=\"length\")\nlen3 = input.int(9, minval=1, title=\"length\")\nsrc = input(close, title=\"Source\")\nhullma1 = ta.wma(2*ta.wma(src, len1/2)-ta.wma(src, len1), math.floor(math.sqrt(len1)))\nhullma2 = ta.wma(2*ta.wma(src, len2/2)-ta.wma(src, len2), math.floor(math.sqrt(len2)))\nhullma3 = ta.wma(2*ta.wma(src, len3/2)-ta.wma(src, len3), math.floor(math.sqrt(len3)))\nplot(hullma1)\n"
